The men of the new religion are frequent companions of the rich and powerful. Favouring the Church is a small price to pay for the legitimacy that they can grant.
This man turns his wounds into wisdom.
Whether it is torturing captives, assassinating rivals, or leading a sack, this man will only ask one question: How much?
